::Halucigen::
"Yes Guiledart.....it WAS a rough trip....." Halucigen spoke standing
and walking out the door to Guiledart.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@y...> wrote:
>  The light scrambled the bots circuts and put it out.
> After the chip was implanted a few percasions were put
> in inside its nueral net but could only be activated
> through a lot of time and effort. He erased his memory
> and replaced it with false ones putting it into his
> spark so to make them seem perfectly real and
> ememenateing the chance of recessive dreams or
> flashbacks of his past life. He added in a few new
> programs like loyalty to the destrons and the main
> objective of destroying the earth and was finished.
> His name was still halucinegen and had the same
> characteristics just diffrent memories. Destron
> memories. Of war and conquest as if he were there for
> every battle through thier galaxy trips. He opened the
> door to the chamber and motioned for the now awakening
> bot to step out. "Come on Halucinegen you got a little
> banged up on our trip back to earth but your fine
> now."
> --- gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Halucigen::
> > Halucigen fought it at first then realized that it
> > was pointless.
> > "Very well" he said letting the plant be implanted
> > without any opposition.
> > "Just keep my skill programs intact....Please!."
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@y...>
> > wrote:
> > >  A trap door opened underneath the bot. about 20
> > wires
> > > came out wrapping around his legs. Pulling him
> > down.
> > > As he fell through the tunnels Guiledart spoke.
> > "Im
> > > sure you can understand I would like some
> > insurance."
> > > He popped into the chamber the door underneath
> > > shutting. The light comeing out scrambling his
> > circuts
> > > and must put him unconsious. "Now we can reprogram
> > you
> > > as Destron." A arm came out with a destron chip
> > and
> > > began to inplant it into the bots brain.
> > > --- gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > ::Halucigen::
> > > > "Greetings...My name is Halucigen. I was talking
> > to
> > > > Magmatron before
> > > > his departure and I have come looking to join
> > you. I
> > > > like the way your
> > > > work. TRapping and threatning.  And don't
> > worry...if
> > > > i really wanted
> > > > out my Corrosion Missiles would take care of
> > that. I
> > > > would like to
> > > > speak with you in person." Halucigen replied
> > calmly
> > > > his small 5 foot
> > > > frame standing very cofidently.
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas
> > <Kinger1984@y...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > >  Guiledart saw ahucenigen on the monitor. "Oh
> > good
> > > > a
> > > > > lab rat." A wall came up around the bot
> > closeing
> > > > him
> > > > > into a 5 by 5 box. a screen appeared with
> > > > guiledart on
> > > > > it. "Well hello my friend. Dont bother trying
> > to
> > > > blast
> > > > > your way out of there it will be futile. One
> > > > question.
> > > > > Why are you here?"
> > > > >
